alert.note: Alert for Lee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 12 at 5:32PM CDT until October 12 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN LEE COUNTY... At 531 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Saltillo, or 9 miles north of Tupelo, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Tupelo, Baldwyn, Saltillo, Guntown, Blair, Pratts Friendship, Sherman, Beech Springs, Chapelville, Belden, Mooreville, Eggville, Birmingham, Corrona, Graves, Frog Island, Unity, Indian Hills and Boggan Bend. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
